org.anyframe.flex.query.service
Interface FlexService

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlexServiceImpl
public interface FlexService

This interface is a common biz. service in developing the presentation layer using Flex which is the RIA solution of the Adobe.

Author:
Jonghoon Kim
